name: Specialised lending exposure type
description:
An attribute  to specify what is the specialised lending type of an exposure.

According to CRR3 art 147 (8): Those exposures shall be assigned to the exposure class referred to in paragraph 2, point (c)(ii), and shall be categorised as follows: project finance (PF), object finance (OF), commodity finance (CF) and income-producing real estate (IPRE)
